snippet: In Tulare County, hit hard by a relentless drought, daily routines have been upended by the drying of wells and the disappearance of tap water.
abstract: Life in rural community of Porterville in Tulare County, California, has been completely upended by drying of wells due to state's record-breaking drought, now in its third year; nowhere in state is situation more dire than in the county, where state officials say that at least 700 households have no access to running water.
lead_paragraph: In Tulare County, hit hard by a relentless drought, daily routines have been upended by the drying of wells and the disappearance of tap water.

headline.main: With Dry Taps and Toilets, California Drought Turns Desperate
headline.print_headline: With Dry Taps and Toilets, California Drought Turns Desperate
